titleInfo.title: Northern Natural Gas Company v. Martin, Pringle, Oliver, Wallace&Bauer

name.namePart: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: Northern Natural Gas Company v. Martin, Pringle, Oliver, Wallace&Bauer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER regarding Reassignment Order 6 - To avoid potential conflicts of interest, the Nebraska Judicial Council has agreed that all cases filed on the Omaha and North Platte dockets subsequent to the date of this order in which Berkshire Hathaway or one of its subsidiaries is a party shall be directly assigned to Senior United States District Judge Lyle E. Strom for full pretrial management and trial. The court will identify a corporate entity as a Berkshire Hathaway subsidiary based solely on Joseph F. Bataillon, Judge Richard G. Kopf and Judge Laurie Smith Camp (PCV, ) information that the entity discloses in the disclosure statement required by Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 7.1 and Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 12.4. This disclosurestatement must be filed in each new case in which the corporate entity is a party. The clerks office is directed to file a copy of this order in each case assigned or reassigned to Judge Strom because Berkshire Hathaway or one of its subsidiaries is a party. This order shall take effect immediately. Ordered by Chief Judge

This disclosurestatement must be filed in each new case in which the corporate entity is a party. The clerks office is directed to file a copy of this order in each case assigned or reassigned to Judge Strom because Berkshire Hathaway or one of its subsidiaries is a party. titleInfo.title: Northern Natural Gas Company v. Martin, Pringle, Oliver, Wallace&Bauer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 20 Motion to Extend; the parties shall have until March 6, 2008, to furnish a statement of facts to accompany the certified question to the Supreme Court of Kansas. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (CJP)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 8:08-cv-00068; Northern Natural Gas Company v. Martin, Pringle, Oliver, Wallace&Bauer;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER granting 20 Motion to Extend; the parties shall have until March 6, 2008, to furnish a statement of facts to accompany the certified question to the Supreme Court of Kansas. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (CJP)

titleInfo.title: Northern Natural Gas Company v. Martin, Pringle, Oliver, Wallace&Bauer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER CERTIFYING QUESTION TO THE KANSAS STATE SUPREME COURT that pending determination by the Kansas State Supreme Court as to whether or not it will accept for review the certified question, this action is stayed pending proceedings in that Court; if the Kansas State Supreme Court accepts review, then the action will be considered stayed until ruling by the Kansas State Supreme Court; no responsive pleadings need be filed at this time; the clerk of this court is hereby directed to transmit forthwith to the Kansas State Supreme Court, under the official seal of the United States District Court for the District of Nebraska, a copy of this order. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (copies mailed as directed)(CJP)

Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (copies mailed as directed)(CJP)

titleInfo.title: Northern Natural Gas Company v. Martin, Pringle, Oliver, Wallace&Bauer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - The unopposed motion for withdrawal and substitution of counsel 27 is granted. Steven D. Ruse is deemed withdrawn as counsel for defendant and Anthony F. Rupp is substituted as counsel for defendant. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (KBJ)

titleInfo.title: Northern Natural Gas Company v. Martin, Pringle, Oliver, Wallace&Bauer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER approving and adopting 31 Joint Stipulation for Dismissal. This action is dismissed with prejudice, each party to pay their own costs, attorney fees and related expenses of litigation. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (JAE)
